document_data.name: Darcleir's Haven
document_data.mainbody: '''Darcleir's Haven''', or derisively known as the '''"The House of Peacocks"''' among the locals, was an exclusive eatery that stood on [[Suzail]]'s grand [[Promenade (Suzail)|Promenade]].

Location.Atmosphere: Darcleir's was known for its exquisite prices and exclusive clientele. Its guests were nobles, always flamboyantly dressed in accordance with Suzail's latest fashion trends, making the place scoffed at among commoners and lowborn. The restaurant was jam-packed with gossiping nobles daily.

document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Darcleir's Haven was a usual haunt for [[Marlin Stormserpent]] of the noble [[House Stormserpent]] of [[Cormyr]].
